TopicTitle: Any users of LIFX on Android? (RESOLVED)

Articles.Content:
I'm trying to set up a LIFX bulb using a Samsung Galaxy Note 2, when I go to the "Connect Light" menu, tap the listed bulb, my phone disconnects from the WiFi and I get a "Oops, that didn't work" error.

So is there anyone that can help?

EDIT: I have fixed this issue, I have no idea how, it just worked.

Edited July 11, 2016 by CAKE99
